descriptionHtml:
[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345184063-delimitations.png[/img]

[color=grey][size=8][b]UPDATES[/b][/size][/color]     [size=4][b]Preview[/b][/size][color=grey]

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OH81xdEaU4I]Video Test[/url] 

[b][size=1]I recommand you to download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22646]Animated Female Idle for Mixed Armor Project[/url][/size][/b][/color]



[color=grey][size=2][b]Currently, it is a replacer version of Dragonscale Armor (Standalone version will be available for the next updates).[/size][/b]

[b]Don\'t worry if you see some issues, just tell me what problems you see and i will try to fix them soon.[/b][/color]


[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345184063-delimitations.png[/img]

[color=grey][size=4][b]Required Mods :[/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url][/b][size=1] by dimon99[/size][/color]

[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345184063-delimitations.png[/img]

[color=grey][size=4][b]Recommanded Mods :[/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22646]Animated Female Idle for Mixed Armor Project[/url][/b][size=1] by Clepsa[/size][/color]

[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/33/1345184063-delimitations.png[/img]


[size=1][color=grey]Hi, i\\\'m working on a new project what consists in mix a lot of existing armors in Skyrim.[/color][/size]


[color=grey]This armor is [/color][color=Lightslategray][b]not uploaded or downloadable yet[/b][/color].[color=grey]
But I would like to know what you think about this and i would appreciate it if you could give me some feedback :[/color]


[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/24339-2-1348060715.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/24339-1-1348060714.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/24339-1-1348060714.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/24339-3-1348060715.jpg[/img]
[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/38/1348057709-face.jpg[/img]
[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/38/1348057706-34-face-droite.jpg[/img]
[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2012/38/1348057708-profile-droit.jpg[/img]


Thanks you and see you soon for updates.
author: Clepsa
